resources.string: Police Station and Telephone Number(Click on it to see police area)

We are currently undergraduates at university of Colombo school of computing. As a team with six members we planned to build this application as a solution to the life threatening situations around today\s transpotation methods. Passengers who can assure about their security using this application inside the Colombo district. So we try to do our best as a aid to passengers through this application and this is also implementing forward.

Our Team

Chosen contact 1 and chosen contact 2 will be the contacts that the emergency sms will be sent. Emergency sms will be contained your last known location.


Averse Destination
• Select the destination you are travelling.
 • The averse destination service will start automatically.
 • To stop the service click on the notification on notification bar.
 • If the destination is diverted a dialog will apear.
 • You can either ignore and continue, show in the map or send sms.


Police Station Details
	Details of the colombo area police stations will be displayed.
